column1: '''''Treasures from the Misty Mountains: A Collector's Guide to Tolkien''''' is a 2001 book by James H. Gilam, offering an overview of collectibles based on Tolkien's legendarium.
Includes a reproduction of a [[Letter to Rayner Unwin (28 December 1953)
column2: postcard from Tolkien to Rayner Unwin]] dated 28 December 1953 (p. 126).<ref name=TB>{{webcite

column1: In addition to giving an overview on collecting and the various movies, including a general preview of the as-of-then upcoming ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', the book also covers licensed products from the 1970s onward, including [[:Category:Books
column3: calendars]], games, and collectibles from various companies ([[Kinder Surprise]], [[Mithril Miniatures]], [[Sideshow Collectibles

column1: TolkienBooks.net writes that "it is far from complete and contains many errors."<ref name=TB/>
